entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
